text: Rodrigo Bandeira da Costa (born 20 December 1993) is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a midfielder for FC Tulsa in the USL Championship. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:FC Tulsa players Category:USL Championship players Category:Florida Memorial Lions Category:College men's soccer players in the United States Category:United Premier Soccer League players Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States
title: Rodrigo Bandeira da Costa
